article_title: US vows support for Israel amid Iran attack fears
sentence: Iran  backs  Hamas  and  Iranian  officials  have  praised  the  attack  in  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  253  taken  to  Gaza  as  hostages.

article_title: US vows support for Israel amid Iran attack fears
sentence: According  to  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry,  more  than  33,000  people  -  mostly  women  and  children  -  have  been  killed  in  the  Israeli  offensive,  which  was  triggered  by  Hamas's  attack.
